Event: Alhamdulillah! Our manuscript titled "Towards Designing a Question-Answering Chatbot for Online News: Understanding Perspectives and Questions" has been accepted in the ACM CHI 2024.
Alhamdulillah! Our manuscript titled "Not all Fake News is Written: A Dataset and Analysis of Misleading Video Headlines" has been accepted in the EMNLP 2023.

Alhamdulillah! Our manuscript titled "Semantic-based Unsupervised Framing Analysis (SUFA): A Novel Approach for Computational Framing Analysis" has been selected as the Top Method Paper in the Communication Theory and Methodology Division Competition in AEJMC 2023.
Md Naimul Hoque has been awarded a Doctoral Student Research Award (DSRA) to study the future of news engagement.
Naeemul Hassan has received the Exemplary Researcher award at the 2023 Maryland Research Excellence Celebration.
Our member Yoo Yeon Sung has received the Doctoral Student Research Award (DSRA) to study Detection of Misleading Videos.
Our member Mohammad Ali has received the Graduate Student Summer Research Fellowship for Summer 2023 to conduct a study on Computational Framing Analysis.
Our member Saransh Grover has received the Dr. Frank G. Burke Endowed Graduate Research Award to conduct a study on Crowdsourced Fact-checking in TikTok.
Naeemul Hassan will talk about Health Misinformation on a webinar organized by National Library of Medicine (NNLM).
Naeemul Hassan discusses the potential of computational journalism in a UMD Special Presentation- Data Journalism: Using Data to Tell Impactful Stories.

Naeemul Hassan will be in a panel discussing "Fighting Disinformation to Save Democracy".
